text:
Aha! - http://www.aha.io - REMOTE

Aha! is the new way to plan a product roadmap. We are growing rapidly, profitable, offer excellent benefits and encourage remote employees.

We are looking for experienced Ruby on Rails developers. We also make extensive use of CoffeeScript, d3.js and react.js.

Email: amy@aha.io if you are interested or read more at http://www.aha.io
